items.sentence: Tom loves Mary's accent when she speaks French.
I've already read most of the books over there.
I'd like to know how this stand-off came about.
Tom was in charge of drawing up the resolution.
Tom doesn't remember anything about his father.
Tom has one of the best voices I've ever heard.
I've been called worse things by better people.
This problem must be solved in the near future.
One day, I'll find out who my real parents are.
The firefighters had to pull me out of the car.
